doc:
Darby Hinton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Darby_Hinton 0 Edgar Raymond Darby Hinton (born August 19, 1957) is an American actor and filmmaker initially cast in commercials when he was six months old. From 1964–1970, he portrayed Israel Boone, a son of American pioneer Daniel Boone, on the NBC adventure series Daniel Boone, with Fess Parker in the title role. He co-starred as Simon Graham in the two-part 1968 episode, "Boomerang, Dog of Many Talents" of NBC's Walt Disney's Wonderful World of Color, with Darren McGavin, Patricia Crowley, and Russ Conway. Edgar_Raymond_Darby_Hinton ( born August_19_,_1957 ) is an_American_actor_and_filmmaker initially_cast in commercials when he was six_months old . From 1964 – 1970 , he portrayed Israel_Boone , a_son of American_pioneer_Daniel_Boone , on the_NBC_adventure_series_Daniel_Boone , with Fess_Parker in the_title_role . He co-starred as Simon_Graham in the_two-part_1968_episode , " Boomerang_,_Dog of Many_Talents " of NBC 's_Walt_Disney 's_Wonderful_World of Color , with Darren_McGavin , Patricia_Crowley , and Russ_Conway .
